trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_SEQ_00<tab>Xeerol Ja is eager to hear back from Halnaruk.

TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_SEQ_01<tab>Xeerol Ja has tasked you with creating Ja Tiika juice.
※Minimum collectability rating for this delivery is 230. Delivering items with a rating of 470 or more will earn greater rewards.
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_SEQ_02<tab>You deliver the Ja Tiika juice to Xeerol Ja. Speak with her again to learn about the next prototype your team will tackle.
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_TODO_00<tab>Deliver Ja Tiika juice to Xeerol Ja.
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “Into the Traverse.”
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_000<tab>I'm glad to see you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I wish I could share the consensus on our last drink, but Halnaruk hasn't been back.

TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_001<tab>And yet, oddly enough, my shop has had an influx of <var 1A 02 /var>other<var 1A 01 /var> Moblins clamoring for fermented aloe juice. I hardly know what to think...
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_HALNARUK_000_002<tab>Pfff... Pfffkohhh! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Xeerol Ja!
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_003<tab>H-Halnaruk!?
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_HALNARUK_000_004<tab>Aloe-rot juicymix is delicious! Incredibly flavortough!
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_HALNARUK_000_005<tab>One sip and Halnaruk's sluggyfeels melted away. Heavypack is now airylight!

TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_HALNARUK_000_006<tab>Most days Halnaruk's parents are all achybacks and grumpywords. But after sipdrinking tasty aloe-rot, they are happy Mobbies both! Now we tell everymobbie to slurp Xeerol Ja's juicymix!
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_007<tab>So you're to thank for all those customers! I'm glad to hear your parents are among those who benefited from our drink.
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_HALNARUK_000_008<tab>Stuffseeking is a solitary job. No one notices Halnaruk's sweatwork, and no one smiles for Halnaruk's bringfinds.
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_HALNARUK_000_009<tab>But mobbiefriends, findfellows, grumpyparents─everyone jumpskips for juicymix! Halnaruk wants to make more jumpskipping─wants to help make more juicymix!
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_010<tab>It seems your concoction healed not only his aching back, but his aching soul as well!
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_011<tab>Well then, now that our team is united, I say we move onto our next drink─a beverage for Hanuhanu.
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_012<tab>I understand their diet consists mainly of reeds, which are beyond the purview of your average fruit stand.

TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_013<tab>But if we can determine how reeds benefit their health, we might craft a comparable juice. You've visited the Hanuhanu in Kozama'uka, haven't you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Did you learn anything about their diet while you were there?
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_A1_000_001<tab>Their reeds replenish their aeth─uh, energies.
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_A1_000_002<tab>Reeds seem to rejuvenate them, body and soul.
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_A1_000_003<tab>I'm sure I did at some point...
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_100_013<tab>I see. Then a fruit rich in magical energies may be just what we need.
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_014<tab>Not to worry─why don't you tell me what you do remember from Kozama'uka, and we'll figure it out together?
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_015<tab>I see. It sounds like reeds may replenish the Hanuhanu's magical energies, so we should seek a fruit that's similarly imbued.
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_HALNARUK_000_016<tab>What about sparkleshiny Ja Tiika bananas in Yak T'el? Halnaruk has a featherfriend who says bananas are a Hanuhanu favorite!

TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_017<tab>Oh, you mean najool! That's a marvelous suggestion. Yak T'el has forests rich in magical energies, so its fruit must be as well. And if your friend vouches for it, all the better!
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_018<tab>So long as we ensure that one glass of juice is as satisfying as a meal of reeds, our Hanuhanu customers will want for nothing.
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_019<tab>Knowing your talents, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I'm sure you can make that happen─you always do!
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_030<tab>Our first creation as a real team! We'll need Ja Tiika bananas in this juice, but the rest I leave to your discretion.
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_HALNARUK_000_031<tab>We need a juicymix that is both tastyfresh and energyrich. Halnaruk is eager to see how you'll craftymake it!
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_035<tab>This consistency looks very promising! I daresay this is just the sort of juice we need.
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_036<tab>Goodness gracious, this juice is thick! And what an aroma! Masterful mixing, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_037<tab>This consistency looks very promising! Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─this should be all we need. Let's have one of our Hanuhanu customers sample it for us.

TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_038<tab>Goodness gracious, this juice is thick! And what an aroma! Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─this should be all we need. Let's have one of our Hanuhanu customers sample it for us.
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_HANUHANU04985_000_040<tab>So this is the Ja Tiika juice you spoke of! Full of energies, is it?
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_HANUHANU04985_000_041<tab>And as for its taste...
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_HANUHANU04985_000_042<tab>What a flavor! Rich and invigorating─why, I feel as though I've just gulped down a beakful of reeds!
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_HANUHANU04985_000_044<tab>I hope you'll make it a permanent addition to your menu. My friends will want a taste of this!
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_HALNARUK_000_045<tab>Powerjuice is a success! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has a deft handyarm.
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_HALNARUK_000_047<tab>When thoughtmade together, our juicymixes are unstoppable!
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_048<tab>Hear, hear! Your suggestion was invaluable for this one, Halnaruk. And for my part, it's been a delight to put my old studies to use in a tangible way.
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_HALNARUK_000_049<tab>Pfff... Kohhh... Halnaruk doesn't understand. Xeerol Ja has good thingknowings, so why not follow goaldream and be a chirurgeon?
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_050<tab>Because I'm not good enough, that's why.
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_051<tab>It's...well, it's a private matter I'd rather not speak of, all right?
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_XEEROLJA_000_052<tab>Let's focus instead on our next juice. I've got something tricky in mind─a real challenge!
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_HALNARUK_000_053<tab>Halnaruk still doesn't understand, but will not presspry.
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>Xeerol Ja is overjoyed with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Hanuhanu Hydrator<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
TEXT_KINGLA304_04985_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>A new quest continuing the story of Xeerol Ja Juicecraft is now available.
